item.title: Continuous Delivery with Spinnaker
item.description: Continuous Delivery with Spinnaker Spinnaker is an open-source, multi-cloud continuous delivery platform, originally developed by Netflix, that helps you release software changes rapidly and reliably. Development team can focus on just application development and leave ops provisioning to Spinnaker for automating reinforcement of business and regulatory requirements. Spinnaker supports several CI systems and build tools like CodeBuild, Jenkins. You can integrate Spinnaker for configuring Artifacts from Git, Amazon S3, Amazon ECR etc.
